column4: My sound has suddenly stopped working could this be related to any of the recent updates?
My sound has suddenly stopped working I haven't the slightest idea what could have caused it except for maybe the most recent updates anyone have any ideas?
do you know what your sound device is?
did you figure out your sound problem?
I have everything set to autodetect and when I hit test it seems to just hang there.  The device is intel ICH5
there's a lot of intel sound devices, open a terminal, and type lspci, its going to output what your sound device is.. see exactly what its detected as.
ok whats that website I use to paste this stuff into?  postbin or pastebin something like that?
indygunfreak: my sound has always worked fine and just stopped working today when I turned my computer on.
indygunfreak: it caught me off guard I thought it was my speakers at first but they seem to be fine.
doesnt seem anyones had much trouble with that sound device.
indygunfreak: well thanks for trying I'll keep messing around and hopefully be able to find something.  I'll probably be so obvious once I figure it out.
